name: postcss-unicode-characters
description: An easier way to write unicode-range descriptors.

1.0.0.name: postcss-unicode-characters
1.0.0.description: An easier way to write unicode-range descriptors.

scripts.prepublish: del-cli dist && cross-env BABEL_ENV=publish babel src --out-dir dist --ignore /__tests__/
